headings.text: Or slightly less restrictive if needed
For IDEs and Database Clients (PhpStorm, VSCode, DBeaver, etc.)
Press Enter when prompted for password (empty)
If mysql client is installed in WSL
Press Enter when prompted for password

C:\\xampp\\htdocs\\isotone/user-docs\\de.title: RedBeanPHP Database Guide for Isotone Developers

headings.text: RedBeanPHP Database Guide for Isotone Developers
Or download the latest release ZIP from GitHub
Install all PHP dependencies via Composer
For development environments, include dev dependencies
Edit config.php with your database credentials
Install Tailwind CSS dependencies (downloads Node.js if needed)
Bump version (creates new version and updates changelog)
